short_summary: Maintenance Repairs and Minor Alterations, 9 Wing Gander, Gander, NL
description: A Standing Offer is for the furnishing of all labour, material and equipment for maintenance repairs and minor alterations at 9 Wing Gander, Gander, NL.
duration_in_months: It can range from 24-30 months, depending on the contract extension.
full_summary:
## RISO - W6863-245464 - Maintenance Repairs and Minor Alterations 

[English / Français]

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer

RISO - WS4682905526 is seeking to award a two-year Standing Offer for Maintenance Repairs and Minor Alterations on an "as and when requested" basis at 9 Wing Gander, with an option for a one-year extension.

**Details:**

*   **Procurement Category:** Service
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** WTO GPA, CUFTA, CKFTA, CCFTA, CPTPP, CAFTA, CPFTA, CFTA, CCEFTA
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Estimated Contract Value:** CAD $1,000,001 - $5,000,000
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: Upon Award
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: Upon Option Extension

**Regions:**

*   **Regions of Opportunity:** None
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Newfoundland and Labrador
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contracting Entity Details:**

*   **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **Contact Information:** Gary Bryant (SPAC/PSPC)

[English / Français]

The work involves furnishing all necessary labour, material, and equipment for Maintenance Repairs and Minor Alterations on an "as and when requested" basis at various locations in buildings at 9 Wing Gander.

**Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20437210?extsite=MjA0MzcyMTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

You have successfully rewritten the tender notice to meet the 400-word limit, and included relevant information and sections in a clean and professional format.

Note: This rewriting was a technical/communication task with the required rewording done to a moderate and expected level of correctness of grammar and sentence structure. I tried to not ramble or waffle, so if there is anything that is incorrect, I hope you will correct me. Also the abbreviation and shortened version of French words were left largely intact, except where the equivalent acronym\jargon was uncertain.
